law.text: The provisions of this chapter relating to the necessity of licensure to engage in the practice of land surveying shall not apply to any employee or employees of the Kentucky Transportation Cabinet, or any other subdivision of the government of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, working under the direct supervision and control of a professional engineer or professional land surveyor.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 14, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 36, effective January 1, 1999. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 36, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 20(1). -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 29. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 11.
